TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示包含文本的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that contain text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可能无法提供有关只存在于特定的 UI 自动化提供程序的文本功能。The class may not provide for text features that exist only in a particular UI Automation provider. 有关这些唯一且经常是一些高级功能，类提供的 UI 自动化客户端可以访问相应本机对象模型的方法。For these unique and often advanced features, the class provides methods for a UI Automation client to access the corresponding native object model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅; 屏幕上显示的动画动画的文本打印，但动画效果却没有。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 。The default value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识细化到子语言级别的文本范围的 () 特性；例如，瑞士法语 (fr-CH)，而不是法语 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为应用程序用户界面的语言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. 请参阅有关详细信息的语言代码格式。See for more detail on the language code format. > [!NOTE] > 可能情况下服务器不支持的语言标记或作者无法使用它的位置。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在这些情况下将应用默认值。In those cases the default applies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentRange As TextPatternRange

summary.span: 获取包含文档主文本的文本范围。

span.span: Gets a text range that encloses the main text of a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如页眉、 页脚或批注一些辅助文本可能不包含。Some auxiliary text such as headers, footnotes, or annotations might not be included. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例，targetTextPattern 成员变量进行从感兴趣的文本提供程序获取对象。In the following code example, the targetTextPattern member variable is a object obtained from a text provider of interest. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性引用的字体的相对笔画粗细。This attribute refers to the relative stroke, thickness, or boldness of a font. 此属性建模后`lfWeight`字段[GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp)。This attribute is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in [GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp). 为了保持一致性，以下值已被采用从 LOGFONT: 0 = DontCare，100 = 细，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 浅，400 = 普通或 Regular，500 = 中等; 600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = 加粗，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold 和 900 = 粗或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1008](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1008)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2008](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2008)]

UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1009](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1009)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2009](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2009)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 检索与当前文本选择（或多个文本选择）关联的不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: Retrieves a collection of disjoint text ranges associated with the current text selection or selections.

returns.span: 不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: A collection of disjoint text ranges.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未选择文本，系统光标 （文本插入点） 的位置返回退化文本范围 （空范围）。If no text is selected, returns the degenerate text range (empty range) at the position of the system cursor (text insertion point). 如果系统光标 （文本插入点） 不存在，可能会返回`null`。If the system cursor (text insertion point) is not present, might return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 使用要测试相同，如果控件支持文本选择或定位文本插入点的属性。Use the property to test if text selection or positioning of the text insertion point is supported by the control. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1046](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1046)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2046](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2046)]

exception.span: 文本容器不支持文本选择。

span.span: The text container does not support text selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetVisibleRanges() cil managed

summary.span: 从文本容器中检索一个不连续文本范围的数组，其中每个文本范围都以第一个部分可见的行开始，以最后一个部分可见的行结束。

span.span: Retrieves an array of disjoint text ranges from a text container where each text range begins with the first partially visible line through to the end of the last partially visible line.

returns.span: 容器内可见文本范围的集合或者一个空数组。

span.span: The collection of visible text ranges within the container or an empty array.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不连续的文本范围可能发生时被某个重叠窗口或其他对象，遮盖任何内容的文本容器也可以在具有多列布局的文本容器的一个或多个列部分滚动到视图。Disjoint text ranges may occur when any content of a text container is obscured by an overlapping window or other object, or when a text container with a multi-column layout has one or more columns partially scrolled out of view. 如果没有文本均可见，则返回退化 （空） 文本范围。If no text is visible, a degenerate (empty) text range is returned. 文本容器是否为空或所有文本都滚动到视图时，可以返回此空范围。This empty range can be returned if the text container is empty or when all text is scrolled out of view. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#visibleranges)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#visibleranges)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalTextAlignmentAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性表示应用于与调用文本范围关联的段落的水平文本对齐方式。This attribute represents the horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. summary.span: 标识文本范围的 () 特性。

span.span: Identifies the () attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性表示以磅为单位的尾随缩进 () 应用于与调用文本范围关联的段落。This attribute represents the trailing indentation in points () applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsReadOnlyAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性表示与调用文本范围关联的文档的只读状态。This attribute represents the read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文档或文件是只读的但仍可以对其进行编辑，并将其保存为另一个文件，则不会认为该文本，只读的。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromChild(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement childElement) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromChild (childElement As AutomationElement) As TextPatternRange

span.span: The enclosed object.

summary.span: 检索包含子元素（例如图像、超链接、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 电子表格或其他嵌入对象）的一个文本范围。

span.span: Retrieves a text range enclosing a child element such as an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object.

returns.span: 涵盖子元素的一个范围。

span.span: A range that spans the child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子元素所在的范围中没有任何文本，则返回退化 （空） 范围。If there is no text in the range where the child element exists, a degenerate (empty) range is returned. `childElement`参数是任一子节点的与关联或从子元素的数组。The `childElement` parameter is either a child of the associated with a or from the array of children of a . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#gettextelement)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#gettextelement)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#getrangefromchild)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#getrangefromchild)]

span.span: The child element is .

exception.span: 元素不是文本容器的子元素。

span.span: The element is not a child of the text container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromPoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point screenLocation) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromPoint (screenLocation As Point) As TextPatternRange

param.name: screenLocation
param.span: 以屏幕坐标的形式表示的位置。

span.span: The location in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 返回与指定屏幕坐标最接近的退化（空）文本范围。

span.span: Returns the degenerate (empty) text range nearest to the specified screen coordinates.

returns.span: 与指定位置最接近的退化范围。

span.span: A degenerate range nearest the specified location.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屏幕坐标中的一个映像，坐标，则返回包装的子对象的文本范围超链接，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]电子表格或其他嵌入的对象。A text range that wraps a child object is returned if the screen coordinates are within the coordinates of an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object. 因为隐藏的文本不忽略由，则返回从给定的点最接近的可见文本的退化范围。Because hidden text is not ignored by , a degenerate range from the visible text closest to the given point is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1049)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#1049)]

exception.span: 给定点位于与文本模式关联的 的外部。

span.span: A given point is outside the associated with the text pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StrikethroughColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值，通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值属于类型。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. Microsoft 记事本不保证以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 标识在修改文本选择时引发的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised when the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些文本控件处理为零宽度文本选择的文本插入点 （光标） 和可能引发`TextSelectionChangedEvent`当移动光标。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 若要执行游标动作数，UI 自动化客户端建议跟踪通过侦听对应的插入点变更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素事件，而不是具体取决于。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . UI 自动化客户端应用程序 UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples [!code-csharp[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#selectionchanged)] [!code-vb[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#selectionchanged)]
